催馬楽: (さいばら) - genre of Heian-period Japanese court music (primarily consisting of gagaku-styled folk melodies)
傭う: (やとう) - to employ; to hire/to charter
傭船: (ようせん) - chartered ship; chartering or hiring a vessel
傭船契約: (ようせんけいやく) - chartering ships
傲る: (おごる) - (esp. 奢る) to give (someone) a treat; to be extravagant/to live luxuriously; (esp. 驕る 傲る) to be proud/to be haughty
傲慢不遜: (ごうまんふそん) - (yoji) haughty; arrogant; overbearing
債券市場: (さいけんしじょう) - bond market
債券格付け: (さいけんかくづけ) - bond rating
債券発行: (さいけんはっこう) - debt issuance; bond issuance
債務: (saimu) - debt, liabilities, obligation to a person or party (uso legal ou contratual)
債務不履行: (さいむふりこう) - default on a debt
債務償還: (さいむしょうかん) - debt redemption
債務国: (さいむこく) - debtor nation; debt-laden country; debtor country
債務帳消し: (さいむちょうけし) - debt forgiveness
債務担保証券: (さいむたんぽしょうけん) - Collateralized Debt Obligation; CDO
債務救済: (さいむきゅうさい) - debt relief
債務整理: (さいむせいり) - adjustment of debts; debt-workout; consolidation of debts; settlement of debts
債権保全: (さいけんほぜん) - credit protection (by seizing assets in anticipation of a default); preventive attachment
債権利回り: (さいけんりまわり) - bond yield
債権勘定: (さいけんかんじょう) - accounts receivable
債権国: (さいけんこく) - creditor country; creditor nation
債権所有者: (さいけんしょゆうしゃ) - bondholder
債権放棄: (さいけんほうき) - debt forgiveness; debt waiver
傷: (ferida/machucado/dor) - wound , wound, injury, cut, gash, bruise, scratch, scrape, scar; chip, crack, scratch, nick; flaw, defect, weakness, weak point; stain (on one's reputation), disgrace, dishonor, dishonour
傷々しい: (いたいたしい) - pitiful; pathetic; painful to look at (e.g. painfully thin, painful-looking scars)
傷つきやすい: (きずつきやすい) - fragile; brittle; delicate; sensitive
傷つき安い: (きずつきやすい) - fragile; brittle; delicate; sensitive
傷つく: (きずつく) - to be wounded/to get injured; to get hurt feelings; to chip/to scratch/to damage
傷つける: (きずつける) - to wound/to injure; to hurt someone's feelings (pride, etc.); to damage/to chip/to scratch
傷み: (いたみ) - (esp. 痛み) pain/ache/soreness/grief/distress; (esp. 傷み) damage/injury/wear/bruise/break
傷む: (いたむ) - (esp. 痛む) to hurt/to feel a pain; (esp. 傷む) to be injured/to be spoiled (e.g. food)
傷める: (いためる) - (usu. 痛める) to hurt/to injure/to cause pain; (usu. 傷める) to harm/to damage/to spoil; (usu. 痛める) to worry/to bother/to be grieved over/to afflict; (usu. 痛める) to cause financial loss/to hurt one's pocket
傷もの: (きずもの) - defective article/damaged goods; deflowered girl/unvirtuous girl
傷を縫う: (きずをぬう) - to stitch up a wound
傷を負う: (きずをおう) - to be injured; to sustain a wound
傷テープ: (キズテープ) - first-aid plaster; adhesive bandage
傷付きやすい: (きずつきやすい) - fragile; brittle; delicate; sensitive
傷付き安い: (きずつきやすい) - fragile; brittle; delicate; sensitive
傷付く: (きずつく) - to be wounded/to get injured; to get hurt feelings; to chip/to scratch/to damage
傷付ける: (きずつける) - to wound/to injure; to hurt someone's feelings (pride, etc.); to damage/to chip/to scratch
傷傷しい: (いたいたしい) - pitiful; pathetic; painful to look at (e.g. painfully thin, painful-looking scars)
傷口: (きずぐち) - (opening of) a wound; (mouth of a) wound; cut
傷口を縫う: (きずぐちをぬう) - to suture a wound; to sew up a wound
傷害: (しょうがい) - wound/injury/accident/casualty; assault/inflicting bodily injury
傷害事件: (しょうがいじけん) - incident resulting in injury
傷害保険: (しょうがいほけん) - accident insurance
傷害罪: (しょうがいざい) - (crime of) inflicting bodily injury
傷害致死: (しょうがいちし) - manslaughter; bodily injury resulting in death
傷害致死罪: (しょうがいちしざい) - (crime of) inflicting bodily injury resulting in death
傷弓の鳥: (しょうきゅうのとり) - (yoji) (person who is) once bitten twice shy; someone who has become overly cautious due to a bad experience
傷弓之鳥: (しょうきゅうのとり) - (yoji) (person who is) once bitten twice shy; someone who has become overly cautious due to a bad experience
傷心旅行: (しょうしんりょこう) - travel to relieve heartbreak; sentimental journey
傷物: (きずもの) - defective article/damaged goods; deflowered girl/unvirtuous girl
傷病: (しょうびょう) - injuries and sickness
傷病兵: (しょうびょうへい) - sick and wounded soldiers
傷病手当: (しょうびょうてあて) - accident and sickness benefits; disability allowance
傷病捕虜: (しょうびょうほりょ) - sick and wounded prisoners
